function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Emphasized flexibility and adaptability of apartment units may lead to frequent rearrangements and changes, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Formation of a large number of terraces and gardens increases the potential for social gatherings and close interactions, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of spaces for gathering and social interaction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission, especially during a pandemic.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of urban agriculture may increase the risk of foodborne illnesses if proper hygiene and sanitation practices are not followed.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex relationship between users and their residential space","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of education and understanding among stakeholders in the design process","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing in indoor common areas","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific measures for contagious disease propagation in residential buildings","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex issue requiring a thorough and integral approach","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pathogen dispersal through respiratory droplets during talking, coughing, and sneezing","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of respiratory droplets with deep lung pathogens during coughing","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of influenza a virus and other respiratory diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Respiratory aerosols containing pathogen-carrying particles emitted during coughing","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Coughed droplets with a size distribution of 0.62-15.9 mm indicating potential risk of disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"More particles retained in the sample bag during the cough droplet study, indicating potential for increased exposure to infectious particles","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evaporation and dispersion of respiratory droplets","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of infectious bioaerosols from vomit and feces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne pathogens from sick person, building, or intentional release","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge on pathogen transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and integration in smart city environments","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient actionable open data and citizen integration","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and security measures in open data initiatives may lead to unauthorized access to sensitive health information","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate citizen engagement and collaboration in open government projects may lead to ineffective crisis management and response","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen engagement in governance processes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease propagation through collaborative strategies and citizen engagement","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective information transparency and trust in information","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation and engagement in co-creation of solutions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low volume of collaboration in innovation platforms and networks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of ets and open governance projects may lead to privacy and data security risks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and information on safety rules and laws","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited discussion on the perception of workers in the pandemic and the effectiveness of safety measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuating trends in construction-related complaints over time","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of complaints in specific states","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complaints filed online and via email may spread contagious diseases due to shared contact surfaces, such as keyboards and touchscreens.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person complaints pose a risk of disease transmission through close contact and shared physical spaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employers not enforcing social distancing","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employers not providing necessary ppe and hygiene facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness about health and safety guidelines","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor communication and awareness about the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 awareness among employees","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation about covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel anxiety increases with travel-related risks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health-related risks influence choice of destination and tourism provider.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of infectious diseases affects travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 beliefs influence vacation plans.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infectious diseases impact travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anxiety as a response to stressful situations","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influences of risk perception on consumer behavior in tourism","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative influence of risk perception on travel intentions during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
